text.ascii: duryodhana uvAca
text.ur: duryodhana uvāca

text.ascii: citrasenaM samAgamya prahasann arjunas tadA
text.ur: citrasenaṁ samāgamya prahasann arjunas tadā

text.ascii: idaM vacanam aklIbam abravIt paravIrahA
text.ur: idaṁ vacanam aklībam abravīt paravīrahā

text.ascii: bhrAtqn arhasi no vIra moktuM gandharvasattama
text.ur: bhrātr̥̄n arhasi no vīra moktuṁ gandharvasattama

text.ascii: anarhA dharSaNaM hIme jIvamAneSu pANDuSu
text.ur: anarhā dharṣaṇaṁ hīme jīvamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣu

text.ascii: evam uktas tu gandharvaH pANDavena mahAtmanA
text.ur: evam uktas tu gandharvaḥ pāṇḍavena mahātmanā

text.ascii: uvAca yat karNa vayaM mantrayanto vinirgatAH
text.ur: uvāca yat karṇa vayaṁ mantrayanto vinirgatāḥ

text.ascii: draSTAraH sma sukhAd dhInAn sadArAn pANDavAn iti
text.ur: draṣṭāraḥ sma sukhād dhīnān sadārān pāṇḍavān iti

text.ascii: tasminn uccAryamANe tu gandharveNa vacasy atha
text.ur: tasminn uccāryamāṇe tu gandharveṇa vacasy atha

text.ascii: bhUmer vivaram anvaicchaM praveSTuM vrIDayAnvitaH
text.ur: bhūmer vivaram anvaicchaṁ praveṣṭuṁ vrīḍayānvitaḥ

text.ascii: yudhiSThiram athAgamya gandharvAH saha pANDavaiH
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhiram athāgamya gandharvāḥ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ

text.ascii: asmaddurmantritaM tasmai baddhAMz cAsmAn nyavedayan
text.ur: asmaddurmantritaṁ tasmai baddhāṁś cāsmān nyavedayan

text.ascii: strIsamakSam ahaM dIno baddhaH zatruvazaM gataH
text.ur: strīsamakṣam ahaṁ dīno baddhaḥ śatruvaśaṁ gataḥ

text.ascii: yudhiSThirasyopahRtaH kiM nu duHkham ataH param
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhirasyopahr̥taḥ kiṁ nu duḥkham ataḥ param

text.ascii: ye me nirAkRtA nityaM ripur yeSAm ahaM sadA
text.ud: ये मे निराकृता नित्यं रिपुर्येषामहं सदा
text.ur: ye me nirākr̥tā nityaṁ ripur yeṣām ahaṁ sadā

text.ascii: tair mokSito 'haM durbuddhir dattaM tair jIvitaM ca me
text.ur: tair mokṣito ’haṁ durbuddhir dattaṁ tair jīvitaṁ ca me

text.ascii: prAptaH syAM yady ahaM vIra vadhaM tasmin mahAraNe
text.ud: प्राप्तः स्यां यद्यहं वीर वधं तस्मिन्महारणे
text.ur: prāptaḥ syāṁ yady ahaṁ vīra vadhaṁ tasmin mahāraṇe

text.ascii: zreyas tad bhavitA mahyam evaMbhUtaM na jIvitam
text.ur: śreyas tad bhavitā mahyam evaṁbhūtaṁ na jīvitam

text.ascii: bhaved yazaH pRthivyAM me khyAtaM gandharvato vadhAt
text.ud: भवेद्यशः पृथिव्यां मे ख्यातं गन्धर्वतो वधात्
text.ur: bhaved yaśaḥ pr̥thivyāṁ me khyātaṁ gandharvato vadhāt

text.ascii: prAptAz ca lokAH puNyAH syur mahendrasadane 'kSayAH
text.ur: prāptāś ca lokāḥ puṇyāḥ syur mahendrasadane ’kṣayāḥ

text.ascii: yat tv adya me vyavasitaM tac chRNudhvaM nararSabhAH
text.ur: yat tv adya me vyavasitaṁ tac chr̥ṇudhvaṁ nararṣabhāḥ

text.ascii: iha prAyam upAsiSye yUyaM vrajata vai gRhAn
text.ud: इह प्रायमुपासिष्ये यूयं व्रजत वै गृहान्
text.ur: iha prāyam upāsiṣye yūyaṁ vrajata vai gr̥hān

text.ascii: bhrAtaraz caiva me sarve prayAntv adya puraM prati
text.ud: भ्रातरश्चैव मे सर्वे प्रयान्त्वद्य पुरं प्रति
text.ur: bhrātaraś caiva me sarve prayāntv adya puraṁ prati

text.ascii: karNaprabhRtayaz caiva suhRdo bAndhavAz ca ye
text.ur: karṇaprabhr̥tayaś caiva suhr̥do bāndhavāś ca ye

text.ascii: duHzAsanaM puraskRtya prayAntv adya puraM prati
text.ur: duḥśāsanaṁ puraskr̥tya prayāntv adya puraṁ prati

text.ascii: na hy ahaM pratiyAsyAmi puraM zatrunirAkRtaH
text.ur: na hy ahaṁ pratiyāsyāmi puraṁ śatrunirākr̥taḥ

text.ascii: zatrumAnApaho bhUtvA suhRdAM mAnakRt tathA
text.ur: śatrumānāpaho bhūtvā suhr̥dāṁ mānakr̥t tathā

text.ascii: sa suhRcchokado bhUtvA zatrUNAM harSavardhanaH
text.ur: sa suhr̥cchokado bhūtvā śatrūṇāṁ harṣavardhanaḥ

text.ascii: vAraNAhvayam AsAdya kiM vakSyAmi janAdhipam
text.ur: vāraṇāhvayam āsādya kiṁ vakṣyāmi janādhipam

text.ascii: bhISmo droNaH kRpo drauNir viduraH saMjayas tathA
text.ur: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kr̥po drauṇir viduraḥ saṁjayas tathā

text.ascii: bAhlIkaH somadattaz ca ye cAnye vRddhasaMmatAH
text.ur: bāhlīkaḥ somadattaś ca ye cānye vr̥ddhasaṁmatāḥ

text.ascii: brAhmaNAH zreNimukhyAz ca tathodAsInavRttayaH
text.ur: brāhmaṇāḥ śreṇimukhyāś ca tathodāsīnavr̥ttayaḥ

text.ascii: kiM mAM vakSyanti kiM cApi prativakSyAmi tAn aham
text.ud: किं मां वक्ष्यन्ति किं चापि प्रतिवक्ष्यामि तानहम्
text.ur: kiṁ māṁ vakṣyanti kiṁ cāpi prativakṣyāmi tān aham

text.ascii: ripUNAM zirasi sthitvA tathA vikramya corasi
text.ud: रिपूणां शिरसि स्थित्वा तथा विक्रम्य चोरसि
text.ur: ripūṇāṁ śirasi sthitvā tathā vikramya corasi

text.ascii: AtmadoSAt paribhraSTaH kathaM vakSyAmi tAn aham
text.ur: ātmadoṣāt paribhraṣṭaḥ kathaṁ vakṣyāmi tān aham

text.ascii: durvinItAH zriyaM prApya vidyAm aizvaryam eva ca
text.ur: durvinītāḥ śriyaṁ prāpya vidyām aiśvaryam eva ca

text.ascii: tiSThanti na ciraM bhadre yathAhaM madagarvitaH
text.ud: तिष्ठन्ति न चिरं भद्रे यथाहं मदगर्वितः
text.ur: tiṣṭhanti na ciraṁ bhadre yathāhaṁ madagarvitaḥ

text.ascii: aho bata yathedaM me kaSTaM duzcaritaM kRtam
text.ud: अहो बत यथेदं मे कष्टं दुश्चरितं कृतम्
text.ur: aho bata yathedaṁ me kaṣṭaṁ duścaritaṁ kr̥tam

text.ascii: svayaM durbuddhinA mohAd yena prApto 'smi saMzayam
text.ur: svayaṁ durbuddhinā mohād yena prāpto ’smi saṁśayam

text.ascii: tasmAt prAyam upAsiSye na hi zakSyAmi jIvitum
text.ur: tasmāt prāyam upāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum

text.ascii: cetayAno hi ko jIvet kRcchrAc chatrubhir uddhRtaH
text.ur: cetayāno hi ko jīvet kr̥cchrāc chatrubhir uddhr̥taḥ

text.ascii: zatrubhiz cAvahasito mAnI pauruSavarjitaH
text.ur: śatrubhiś cāvahasito mānī pauruṣavarjitaḥ

text.ascii: pANDavair vikramADhyaiz ca sAvamAnam avekSitaH
text.ur: pāṇḍavair vikramāḍhyaiś ca sāvamānam avekṣitaḥ

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: evaM cintAparigato duHzAsanam athAbravIt
text.ur: evaṁ cintāparigato duḥśāsanam athābravīt

text.ascii: duHzAsana nibodhedaM vacanaM mama bhArata
text.ur: duḥśāsana nibodhedaṁ vacanaṁ mama bhārata

text.ascii: pratIccha tvaM mayA dattam abhiSekaM nRpo bhava
text.ud: प्रतीच्छ त्वं मया दत्तमभिषेकं नृपो भव
text.ur: pratīccha tvaṁ mayā dattam abhiṣekaṁ nr̥po bhava

text.ascii: prazAdhi pRthivIM sphItAM karNasaubalapAlitAm
text.ur: praśādhi pr̥thivīṁ sphītāṁ karṇasaubalapālitām

text.ascii: bhrAtqn pAlaya visrabdhaM maruto vRtrahA yathA
text.ur: bhrātr̥̄n pālaya visrabdhaṁ maruto vr̥trahā yathā

text.ascii: bAndhavAs tvopajIvantu devA iva zatakratum
text.ur: bāndhavās tvopajīvantu devā iva śatakratum

text.ascii: brAhmaNeSu sadA vRttiM kurvIthAz cApramAdataH
text.ur: brāhmaṇeṣu sadā vr̥ttiṁ kurvīthāś cāpramādataḥ

text.ascii: bandhUnAM suhRdAM caiva bhavethAs tvaM gatiH sadA
text.ud: बन्धूनां सुहृदां चैव भवेथास्त्वं गतिः सदा
text.ur: bandhūnāṁ suhr̥dāṁ caiva bhavethās tvaṁ gatiḥ sadā

text.ascii: jJAtIMz cApy anupazyethA viSNur devagaNAn iva
text.ur: jñātīṁś cāpy anupaśyethā viṣṇur devagaṇān iva

text.ascii: guravaH pAlanIyAs te gaccha pAlaya medinIm
text.ur: guravaḥ pālanīyās te gaccha pālaya medinīm

text.ascii: nandayan suhRdaH sarvAJ zAtravAMz cAvabhartsayan
text.ur: nandayan suhr̥daḥ sarvāñ śātravāṁś cāvabhartsayan

text.ascii: kaNThe cainaM pariSvajya gamyatAm ity uvAca ha
text.ur: kaṇṭhe cainaṁ pariṣvajya gamyatām ity uvāca ha

text.ascii: tasya tad vacanaM zrutvA dIno duHzAsano 'bravIt
text.ur: tasya tad vacanaṁ śrutvā dīno duḥśāsano ’bravīt

text.ascii: azrukaNThaH suduHkhArtaH prAJjaliH praNipatya ca
text.ur: aśrukaṇṭhaḥ suduḥkhārtaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇipatya ca

text.ascii: sagadgadam idaM vAkyaM bhrAtaraM jyeSTham AtmanaH
text.ur: sagadgadam idaṁ vākyaṁ bhrātaraṁ jyeṣṭham ātmanaḥ

text.ascii: prasIdety apatad bhUmau dUyamAnena cetasA
text.ur: prasīdety apatad bhūmau dūyamānena cetasā

text.ascii: duHkhitaH pAdayos tasya netrajaM jalam utsRjan
text.ur: duḥkhitaḥ pādayos tasya netrajaṁ jalam utsr̥jan

text.ascii: uktavAMz ca naravyAghro naitad evaM bhaviSyati
text.ur: uktavāṁś ca naravyāghro naitad evaṁ bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: vidIryet sanagA bhUmir dyauz cApi zakalIbhavet
text.ur: vidīryet sanagā bhūmir dyauś cāpi śakalībhavet

text.ascii: ravir AtmaprabhAM jahyAt somaH zItAMzutAM tyajet
text.ur: ravir ātmaprabhāṁ jahyāt somaḥ śītāṁśutāṁ tyajet

text.ascii: vAyuH zaighryam atho jahyAd dhimavAMz ca parivrajet
text.ur: vāyuḥ śaighryam atho jahyād dhimavāṁś ca parivrajet

text.ascii: zuSyet toyaM samudreSu vahnir apy uSNatAM tyajet
text.ur: śuṣyet toyaṁ samudreṣu vahnir apy uṣṇatāṁ tyajet

text.ascii: na cAhaM tvad Rte rAjan prazAseyaM vasuMdharAm
text.ur: na cāhaṁ tvad r̥te rājan praśāseyaṁ vasuṁdharām

text.ascii: punaH punaH prasIdeti vAkyaM cedam uvAca ha
text.ud: पुनः पुनः प्रसीदेति वाक्यं चेदमुवाच ह
text.ur: punaḥ punaḥ prasīdeti vākyaṁ cedam uvāca ha

text.ascii: tvam eva naH kule rAjA bhaviSyasi zataM samAH
text.ud: त्वमेव नः कुले राजा भविष्यसि शतं समाः
text.ur: tvam eva naḥ kule rājā bhaviṣyasi śataṁ samāḥ

text.ascii: evam uktvA sa rAjendra sasvanaM praruroda ha
text.ud: एवमुक्त्वा स राजेन्द्र सस्वनं प्ररुरोद ह
text.ur: evam uktvā sa rājendra sasvanaṁ praruroda ha

text.ascii: pAdau saMgRhya mAnArhau bhrAtur jyeSThasya bhArata
text.ur: pādau saṁgr̥hya mānārhau bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya bhārata

text.ascii: tathA tau duHkhitau dRSTvA duHzAsanasuyodhanau
text.ur: tathā tau duḥkhitau dr̥ṣṭvā duḥśāsanasuyodhanau

text.ascii: abhigamya vyathAviSTaH karNas tau pratyabhASata
text.ur: abhigamya vyathāviṣṭaḥ karṇas tau pratyabhāṣata

text.ascii: viSIdathaH kiM kauravyau bAlizyAt prAkRtAv iva
text.ur: viṣīdathaḥ kiṁ kauravyau bāliśyāt prākr̥tāv iva

text.ascii: na zokaH zocamAnasya vinivarteta kasya cit
text.ur: na śokaḥ śocamānasya vinivarteta kasya cit

text.ascii: yadA ca zocataH zoko vyasanaM nApakarSati
text.ud: यदा च शोचतः शोको व्यसनं नापकर्षति
text.ur: yadā ca śocataḥ śoko vyasanaṁ nāpakarṣati

text.ascii: sAmarthyaM kiM tv ataH zoke zocamAnau prapazyathaH
text.ud: सामर्थ्यं किं त्वतः शोके शोचमानौ प्रपश्यथः
text.ur: sāmarthyaṁ kiṁ tv ataḥ śoke śocamānau prapaśyathaḥ

text.ascii: dhRtiM gRhNIta mA zatrUJ zocantau nandayiSyathaH
text.ur: dhr̥tiṁ gr̥hṇīta mā śatrūñ śocantau nandayiṣyathaḥ

text.ascii: kartavyaM hi kRtaM rAjan pANDavais tava mokSaNam
text.ur: kartavyaṁ hi kr̥taṁ rājan pāṇḍavais tava mokṣaṇam

text.ascii: nityam eva priyaM kAryaM rAjJo viSayavAsibhiH
text.ur: nityam eva priyaṁ kāryaṁ rājño viṣayavāsibhiḥ

text.ascii: pAlyamAnAs tvayA te hi nivasanti gatajvarAH
text.ur: pālyamānās tvayā te hi nivasanti gatajvarāḥ

text.ascii: nArhasy evaMgate manyuM kartuM prAkRtavad yathA
text.ur: nārhasy evaṁgate manyuṁ kartuṁ prākr̥tavad yathā

text.ascii: viSaNNAs tava sodaryAs tvayi prAyaM samAsthite
text.ur: viṣaṇṇās tava sodaryās tvayi prāyaṁ samāsthite

text.ascii: uttiSTha vraja bhadraM te samAzvAsaya sodarAn
text.ud: उत्तिष्ठ व्रज भद्रं ते समाश्वासय सोदरान्
text.ur: uttiṣṭha vraja bhadraṁ te samāśvāsaya sodarān

text.ascii: rAjann adyAvagacchAmi taveha laghusattvatAm
text.ur: rājann adyāvagacchāmi taveha laghusattvatām

text.ascii: kim atra citraM yad vIra mokSitaH pANDavair asi
text.ur: kim atra citraṁ yad vīra mokṣitaḥ pāṇḍavair asi

text.ascii: sadyo vazaM samApannaH zatrUNAM zatrukarzana
text.ur: sadyo vaśaṁ samāpannaḥ śatrūṇāṁ śatrukarśana

text.ascii: senAjIvaiz ca kauravya tathA viSayavAsibhiH
text.ur: senājīvaiś ca kauravya tathā viṣayavāsibhiḥ

text.ascii: ajJAtair yadi vA jJAtaiH kartavyaM nRpateH priyam
text.ud: अज्ञातैर्यदि वा ज्ञातैः कर्तव्यं नृपतेः प्रियम्
text.ur: ajñātair yadi vā jñātaiḥ kartavyaṁ nr̥pateḥ priyam

text.ascii: prAyaH pradhAnAH puruSAH kSobhayanty arivAhinIm
text.ur: prāyaḥ pradhānāḥ puruṣāḥ kṣobhayanty arivāhinīm

text.ascii: nigRhyante ca yuddheSu mokSyante ca svasainikaiH
text.ud: निगृह्यन्ते च युद्धेषु मोक्ष्यन्ते च स्वसैनिकैः
text.ur: nigr̥hyante ca yuddheṣu mokṣyante ca svasainikaiḥ

text.ascii: senAjIvAz ca ye rAjJAM viSaye santi mAnavAH
text.ud: सेनाजीवाश्च ये राज्ञां विषये सन्ति मानवाः
text.ur: senājīvāś ca ye rājñāṁ viṣaye santi mānavāḥ

text.ascii: taiH saMgamya nRpArthAya yatitavyaM yathAtatham
text.ur: taiḥ saṁgamya nr̥pārthāya yatitavyaṁ yathātatham

text.ascii: yady evaM pANDavai rAjan bhavadviSayavAsibhiH
text.ur: yady evaṁ pāṇḍavai rājan bhavadviṣayavāsibhiḥ

text.ascii: yadRcchayA mokSito 'dya tatra kA paridevanA
text.ur: yadr̥cchayā mokṣito ’dya tatra kā paridevanā

text.ascii: na caitat sAdhu yad rAjan pANDavAs tvAM nRpottama
text.ur: na caitat sādhu yad rājan pāṇḍavās tvāṁ nr̥pottama

text.ascii: svasenayA saMprayAntaM nAnuyAnti sma pRSThataH
text.ur: svasenayā saṁprayāntaṁ nānuyānti sma pr̥ṣṭhataḥ

text.ascii: zUrAz ca balavantaz ca saMyugeSv apalAyinaH
text.ur: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca saṁyugeṣv apalāyinaḥ

text.ascii: bhavatas te sabhAyAM vai preSyatAM pUrvam AgatAH
text.ur: bhavatas te sabhāyāṁ vai preṣyatāṁ pūrvam āgatāḥ

text.ascii: pANDaveyAni ratnAni tvam adyApy upabhuJjase
text.ur: pāṇḍaveyāni ratnāni tvam adyāpy upabhuñjase

text.ascii: sattvasthAn pANDavAn pazya na te prAyam upAvizan
text.ur: sattvasthān pāṇḍavān paśya na te prāyam upāviśan

text.ascii: uttiSTha rAjan bhadraM te na cintAM kartum arhasi
text.ud: उत्तिष्ठ राजन्भद्रं ते न चिन्तां कर्तुमर्हसि
text.ur: uttiṣṭha rājan bhadraṁ te na cintāṁ kartum arhasi

text.ascii: avazyam eva nRpate rAjJo viSayavAsibhiH
text.ur: avaśyam eva nr̥pate rājño viṣayavāsibhiḥ

text.ascii: priyANy AcaritavyAni tatra kA paridevanA
text.ur: priyāṇy ācaritavyāni tatra kā paridevanā

text.ascii: madvAkyam etad rAjendra yady evaM na kariSyasi
text.ur: madvākyam etad rājendra yady evaṁ na kariṣyasi

text.ascii: sthAsyAmIha bhavatpAdau zuzrUSann arimardana
text.ur: sthāsyāmīha bhavatpādau śuśrūṣann arimardana

text.ascii: notsahe jIvitum ahaM tvadvihIno nararSabha
text.ur: notsahe jīvitum ahaṁ tvadvihīno nararṣabha

text.ascii: prAyopaviSTas tu nRpa rAjJAM hAsyo bhaviSyasi
text.ur: prāyopaviṣṭas tu nr̥pa rājñāṁ hāsyo bhaviṣyasi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktas tu karNena rAjA duryodhanas tadA
text.ur: evam uktas tu karṇena rājā duryodhanas tadā

text.ascii: naivotthAtuM manaz cakre svargAya kRtanizcayaH
text.ur: naivotthātuṁ manaś cakre svargāya kr̥taniścayaḥ
